article_title: Congress Nears Agreement on Spending Bill to Avoid Government Shutdown
article_text:
WASHINGTON—Congressional leaders were nearing agreement on a $1.15 trillion spending bill and year-end tax legislation Monday, but were still haggling over a handful of thorny policy issues.

Lawmakers said they expected to finalize legislation on Tuesday to fund the government for fiscal 2016 that would be passed later this week. Congress would...
